title: Fort Monroe National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Reservations   Group Tours The Casemate Museum is operated by the Commonwealth of Virginia with curatorial support provided by the US Army. Individual admission to the Casemate Museum is free. Group tours for pre-formed groups of 10 or more (and school groups Grade 3 and above) with a fee of $3.00 per person, please allow a two week notice when scheduling. Call 757-788-5591 for reservations.   Weddings and Special Occasions The Fort Monroe Authority(FMA) is the primary land manager at this time. The Weddings and Special Occasions page on the FMA website is the best place to start making plans here at Fort Monroe.   Camping RV and tent campsites are available at the Colonies RV and Travel Park. The number of sites are limited and quite popular, please allow plenty of time in advance of your trip to book your spot. Reservations can be made in-person, online, or by calling 757-722-2200 or 757-635-0471.
